oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Schools; Educational facilities
Education; Education - Tennessee; Education - History - Tennessee; School buildings - Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Front and side views of the white school at Walnut Grove in Sumner County. Though the building is of simple clapboard construction, fretwork decorates the front porch roof.
Walnut Grove is a small community in western Sumner County located near the town of White House.
